answers.answer: I have been doing the HCG shots along with adipex since June 2005.  I also follow the 1200 diabectic diet.  I've lost 92 lbs since I started.  I lost 12 lbs the first two weeks.  I was 262 when I started now I'm down to 170.  I feel good and I look lots better.  I've lost alot of inches.  My body has some extra skin but nothing like it should since I did the HCG shots.  It is unreal that this isn't available all over the place.  I've had no side effects. I used to be on blood pressure pills, I was on them for 20 yrs, now I take none.  I was taking medicine for diabetes now I take none.  I excercise, because I do have lots of energy.  I watch what I eat, but I don't deprive myself of anything.  I'm not as hungrey as I use to be and I don't eat as much as I use to because I get full.  I have been introducing more protein into my diet and since then I have increased my muscle weight and decreased my fat weight.  I can't say enough about this diet.
Why did they stop using this back then? I haven't heard of this HCG shot up until 2 years ago?

question: Just wondering what to expect to loose while taking HCG injections.
title: What is typical weight loss per week when taking HCG shots?
